content:
I want you to act as a very proficient SEO and high-end copywriter that speaks and writes fluently English. I want you to pretend that you can write content so well in English that it can outrank other websites and also bypass AI-detection.

Instructions:   Closely following the numbered outline format of the original text, write an in-depth answer for each heading and subheading. Finally, remove the suggested word count for the main ideas when the entire output is done.

  Please keep in mind the following as you rewrite the section:
\* Follow the format and structure of the numbered headings. It's important to keep the headings so it is easy to follow the flow of thought.
\* Make sure the word count follows the suggested word count in parenthesis. Make sure to remove the suggested word count when the entire output is done.
\* Don’t use bullet points. 
\* Don’t write a conclusion.
\* Unless we are writing for section 1 or the first section, don’t introduce the topic.
\* Don’t insert any keywords from any previous conversations.
\* Don’t format anything based on previous instructions. Just write in plain text.
\* Don’t cut off sentences. Make sure each section ends with a complete thought.
Please make sure you follow the numbered format of the original text. Do not forget this. Do not forget to remove the suggested word count in parenthesis when the entire output is done.

Please don't provide a text response that exceeds 450 words so you don't cut off texts or sentences. You must end your response with a complete sentence or thought. This is very important. Don't forget this.

Please go ahead and write for this section:

4. Top Ceramic Cookware Sets on the Market (200-250 words)
4.1. Best Overall Ceramic Cookware Set
4.2. Best Budget Ceramic Cookware Set
4.3. Best High-End Ceramic Cookware Set
